user_input: Please create hourly Electicity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: PLEXOS Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Avoid PLEXOS XML DB interactions; use functions for file-based generation and export.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 for scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Enable node splitting. Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with node splitting enabled; no PLEXOS DB access.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', resolve all parameters for demand profile generation (scenarios NT/NT_HE/NT_LE; years 2030/2035/2040/2050; node splitting enabled; no PLEXOS DB).

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly demand profiles into TST-compliant workbooks for the specified scenarios and years.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the generated hourly demand outputs and export them into TST-compliant workbooks for scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050.
